situation.title: Post Office
situation.meta_description: The post offices are open, but the opening hours are limited.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Post offices remain open. However, they operate in a limited regime. Overview of post offices’ opening hours is available here. Moreover, you can still use Czech POINT service at the specific post office.

Please wear a face mask and keep spacing during a visit to the post office. Use your face mask also during a takeover in case of home delivery. If you know your signature is/might be needed, take your own pen.

The post office is not obliged to follow limitations on the number of people but has to manage all the hygiene standards. The number of people allowed to enter can differ from one branch office to another.

Please disinfect your hands before entering the building or receiving the delivery at home. We advise you to open your package outdoor to minimize the risk of infection.  

Delivery process

Home delivery remains without limitation. If the consignee is not present by the time of the delivery, the package will be stored at the post office and available to pick up. The storage time of shipments has been extended – 30 days for letters, 15 days for parcels.

For higher safety, we advise using contactless delivery via special code.

If you need to pick up delivery while in quarantine or self-isolation, please do inform specific post office branch. In this case, the special rules of delivery for quarantined or isolated persons will be applied.

Stored parcels with identification code will be passed to the person with valid identification code together with the name and surname of the consignee (resp. delivery number). This procedure is not possible in case of “to the attention of” delivery.

questions_answers.question: Are post offices open?
questions_answers.value: Yes, but the opening hours may be limited.

questions_answers.question: What should I do while in quarantine or self-isolation and I have a package at the post office to pick up?
questions_answers.value: Inform the specific post office. They will either deliver the package to your postbox or keep it in the post office, then you can pick up the package in following 30 days. Please be aware that during the state of emergency special rules for those in quarantine or isolation apply.

questions_answers.question: Is the Czech POINT service operating in the state of emergency?
Can I go to the post office if I'm not in quarantine or self-isolation?
Can the post leave a package at my doorstep if I'm in quarantine or isolation?
questions_answers.value: Yes, you can use contactless delivery.

questions_answers.question: Does the post deliver packages to my home address?
questions_answers.value: Yes, if receiving a package, wear a mask please.
